name: Mexco Energy Corporation
description: Mexco Energy Corporation is an independent oil and natural gas company focused on the exploration, development, and production of energy resources in the United States. Established in 1972, Mexco has built a strong portfolio of properties in the Permian Basin and other key oil and gas regions. The company operates with a commitment to sustainable practices while maximizing shareholder value through strategic acquisitions and efficient operational management. Mexco's team of experienced professionals is dedicated to leveraging advanced technology and best practices to enhance production and optimize resource recovery. The company emphasizes safety and environmental stewardship in all its operations, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards while aiming for operational excellence. Mexco's diverse asset base includes both operated and non-operated properties, providing a balanced approach to production and risk management. With ongoing investments in technology and infrastructure, Mexco is well-positioned to meet the evolving energy demands and contribute to the energy sector's growth.

faq.answer: R. Gerald McGowan is the CEO of Mexco Energy Corporation.
